Player History
Released by Troy on 10/29/1984...
Signed as a free agent by Bay City on 2/14/1985 to a 7-year deal worth $12,924,800 per year...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1985, off Forrest Brewer (Mal)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/17/1985, off Terry Frost Jr. (Mal)...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/28/1985, hitting .452 with 1 HR, 13 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1985, hitting .407 with 2 HR, 26 RBI...
Had 23-game hitting streak snapped on 5/12/1985...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/28/1985, hitting .483 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Injured on 8/1/1985 with a Torn Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for full season...
Won Outstanding Newcomer Award in 1985, hitting .332 with 7 HR, 78 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/21/1986, hitting .457 with 4 HR, 11 RBI...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/22/1986, hitting .480 with 3 HR, 5 RBI...
